About Me

It's good to know who you are working with. Let me tell you about myself.

Hi! My name is Jordon Osborne, I am a father of two and self taught programmer. I work full time with Eastman Chemical Company designing and developing webpages, forms, and reports using microsoft tools such as Power Apps, Power BI, and Power Automate. While I primarily use design platforms such as SharePoint and WIX, my true passion is to develop more custom solutions using HTML, CSS, and Javascript.

Bachelors Degree of Science

Graduated from East Tennessee State University with a major in Chemistry and a minor in mathematics.

Udemy HTML/CSS Certificte

Completed Udemy HTML/CSS course by Brad Traversy. Projects have been modified to show complete understanding of concepts provided in the course.

Skill Assessment Badge (SharePoint)

Only people who score in the top 30% earn a badge. Over 472 thousand LinkedIn members attempted this assessment.

Skill Assessment Badge (CSS)

Only people who score in the top 30% earn a badge. Over 1.5 million LinkedIn members attempted this assessment.
